full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 632 Filed 03/07/22 Page 2 of 8 Southern District of New York respectfully requests the Court to issue an order requiring to give testimony at the March 8, 2022 hearing in United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), pursuant to the provisions of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 6002 and 6003. Dated: New York, New York March 7, 2022 Respectfully, DAMIAN WILLIAMS United States Attorney

text_blocks.content: Southern District of New York respectfully requests the Court to issue an order requiring to give testimony at the March 8, 2022 hearing in United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), pursuant to the provisions of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 6002 and 6003.
Dated: New York, New York March 7, 2022

additional_notes: The document is a court filing with a signature from DAMIAN WILLIAMS, United States Attorney. The document is related to the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
